subject: Football
Restaurants
lead_paragraph: Although they know Bears quarterback Brian Griese by name, the people at Joe’s Stone Crab do not to use it when calling his party, a habit that extends back to Bob Griese’s playing days.
snippet: Although they know Bears quarterback Brian Griese by name, the people at Joe’s Stone Crab do not to use it when calling his party, a habit that extends back to Bob Griese’s playing days.
